articles.title: Walmart announces more than $19.3 million in cash bonuses for Tennessee associates - WVLT
articles.description: Both full- and part-time associates are eligible for the bonus.
articles.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT) - Walmart announced nearly $20 million will be distributed in cash bonuses for Tennessee store associates.
According to Walmart, $9.2 million in quarterly bonuses will be giv… [+800 chars]
